actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Foreign Affairs.
Referred to Subcommittee on Asian and Pacific Affairs.
Referred to Subcommittee on Human Rights and International Organizations.

committees.subcommittee: Subcommittee on Asian and Pacific Affairs
Subcommittee on Human Rights and International Organizations

official_title: A concurrent resolution expressing the sense of Congress that the executive branch will recognize the traditional commitment of the United States to the right of all people to independence and autonomy as it applies to the situation in Afghanistan.

summary.text: Expresses the sense of the Congress that U.S. officials should recognize the traditional commitment of the United States to the right of all peoples to independence and autonomy as it applies to Afghanistan.

titles.title: A concurrent resolution expressing the sense of Congress that the executive branch will recognize the traditional commitment of the United States to the right of all people to independence and autonomy as it applies to the situation in Afghanistan.
